text: A limited partner shall not have the right or the power as a limited partner to act for or bind the limited partnership.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 302 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-703.02

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: No right or power as limited partner to bind limited partnership.
